All Users Please Read, Special Note From Lisa!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2002 Topics ( Year Of The Password): All Users Please Read, Special Note From Lisa!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, July 28, 2002 - 07:16 pm:

Well, the new registration system has worked pretty smoothly. However, at least once a day now, I get emails telling me that there's no info on the site on how to get an account. (*snicker* they aren't READING the front page...) Anyway, if people email any of you, please don't circumvent the process and tell them the steps to getting an account. I want everyone to read the Office Of The Mayor before getting an account, for important legal and disciplanary reasons. (And, it's sort of an IQ test. If they can't see that it says "How To Get An Account" on the front page, they may not be able to read and understand our FAQS well, either.)

When people ask me how to get an account, I email a reply telling them to go to the front page and click on the Office Of The Mayor. If they don't understand this, they should be either replying to me, or READING the Office Of The Mayor, not trying to get other people to email them the account information.

Thanks for your help in this matter!
